changeSet.author: Andres Schuster
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `credit_card` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `timestamp` datetime(6) NOT NULL, `deleted_at` datetime(6), `updated_at` datetime(6), `UUID` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `brand` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `card_number` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `card_holder` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `expiration_date` datetime(6) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
